name: Unmoored
description:
Follow Charlie's story as he proves he does everything alone.

Controls:

Left click!

Interacts with objects, and advances dialogue.

Made for Game Parade spring game jam. Theme: Every Life Counts

Please Note:

The writing and art have been thoroughly updated during the polish stage, so I hope you enjoy the "full" experience of Unmoored.

Please let me know of any obvious mistakes in the writing.
